Protocols/YMSafeSubscriptable.html#/s:5Y.name: subscript(safe:)
Protocols/YMSafeSubscriptable.html#/s:5Y.abstract: Allows subscripting collections in a safe manner, without out-of-bounds exceptions.

Protocols/YMJSONDataEncodable.html#/s:5Y.abstract: Encodes the value to optional JSON Data using JSONEncoder.

Protocols/YMJSONDataDecodable.html.name: YMJSONDataDecodable
Protocols/YMJSONDataDecodable.html.abstract: A protocol that facilitates faster and easier decoding of JSON.

Protocols/YMSafeSubscriptable.html.name: YMSafeSubscriptable
Protocols/YMSafeSubscriptable.html.abstract: Adopt this protocol to prevent out-of-bounds-class errors in collections.

Protocols/YMStringRepresentable.html.name: YMStringRepresentable
Protocols/YMStringRepresentable.html.abstract: A protocol that enforces values of the conforming type to always have nice String representation.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC5YMK.abstract: Pins the view to its superview’s sides with optional insets.

Extensions/UITableView.html#/s:So11UITab.abstract: Automatically adjusts height of the footer view to fit the content.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS5YMKitE9loca.name: localized

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS5YMKitE9loca.name: localized(with:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS5YMKitE9loca.abstract: Returns a string by pulling a format string from the Localizable.strings file by the key (the string you call this method on), and replacing placeholders with the arguments.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS5YMKitE9loca.name: localized(arguments:locale:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS5YMKitE9loca.abstract: Returns a string by pulling a format string from the Localizable.strings file by the key (the string you call this method on), and replacing placeholders with the arguments.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS5YMKitE24mat.name: matchesRegularExpression(fromPattern:withOptions:)

Extensions/Double.html#/s:Sd5YMKitE36get.abstract: Convert Double values to price strings that use significant digits formatting (see NumberFormatter.usesSignificantDigits). You can optionally specify minimum and maximum numbers of significant digits, locale, currency code, and currency symbol.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa5YMKitE6appen.abstract: Adds the elements of a sequence to the end of the array if the specified closure evaluates to true.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa5YMKitE6remov.abstract: Removes and returns the element at the specified position if the specified closure evaluates to true.

Extensions/NSNumber.html#/s:So8NSNumberC.abstract: Convert NSNumber values to price strings. You can optionally specify minimum and maximum numbers of fraction digits, locale, currency code, and currency symbol.

Enums/YMFormatter/Date.html#/s:5YMKit11Y.name: date
Enums/YMFormatter/Date.html#/s:5YMKit11Y.abstract: The Date that will be used as formatter input.

Enums/YMFormatter/Date.html.name: Date
Enums/YMFormatter/Date.html.abstract: A collection of methods that allow formatting Dates as other types, mainly Strings.

Enums/YMFormatter/Number.html.name: Number
Enums/YMFormatter/Number.html.abstract: A collection of methods that allow formatting numbers as other types, primarily Strings.

Enums/YMFormatter.html#/s:5YMKit11YMForm.abstract: Compose person name components into a single string with the specified style.

Enums/YMFormatter.html#/s:5YMKit11YMForm.abstract: Compose a person’s first name and last name into a single string with the specified style.

Enums/YMFormatter.html.name: YMFormatter
Enums/YMFormatter.html.abstract: A collection of methods for formatting different kinds of data, such as names, prices, and more.

Enums/YMLayoutError.html.name: YMLayoutError
Enums/YMLayoutError.html.abstract: An enum that holds error cases related to UI, and specifically Auto Layout.

Classes/YMKitInfo/DeviceInfo/OS.html#/s:.name: name
Classes/YMKitInfo/DeviceInfo/OS.html#/s:.abstract: Returns name of the operating system installed on the device.

Classes/YMKitInfo/DeviceInfo/OS.html#/s:.name: version
Classes/YMKitInfo/DeviceInfo/OS.html#/s:.abstract: Returns version of the operating system installed on the device.

Classes/YMKitInfo/AppInfo.html#/s:5YMKit.name: build
Classes/YMKitInfo/AppInfo.html#/s:5YMKit.abstract: Returns build number of currently installed main app (the one YMKit is embedded into).

Classes/YMKitInfo/AppInfo.html#/s:5YMKit.name: bundleID
Classes/YMKitInfo/AppInfo.html#/s:5YMKit.abstract: Returns bundle identifier of the main app.

Classes/YMKitInfo/AppInfo.html#/s:5YMKit.name: name
Classes/YMKitInfo/AppInfo.html#/s:5YMKit.abstract: Returns display name (product name) of the main app.

Classes/YMKitInfo/AppInfo.html#/s:5YMKit.name: version
Classes/YMKitInfo/AppInfo.html#/s:5YMKit.abstract: Returns version number of currently installed main app (the one YMKit is embedded into).

Classes/YMKitInfo.html#/s:5YMKit0A4InfoC.name: version
Classes/YMKitInfo.html#/s:5YMKit0A4InfoC.abstract: Returns the number of currently installed YMKit version.

Classes/YMKitInfo/AppInfo.html.name: AppInfo
Classes/YMKitInfo/AppInfo.html.abstract: Information about the app YMKit is embedded into.

Classes/YMKitInfo/DeviceInfo.html.name: DeviceInfo
Classes/YMKitInfo/DeviceInfo.html.abstract: Information the device that’s being used to run the app with YMKit.

Classes/YMKitInfo.html.name: YMKitInfo
Classes/YMKitInfo.html.abstract: A class that provides information about the YMKit framework itself, as well as the device, its operating system, etc.

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
